title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best Of The Herd, Colin wonders what the Brooklyn Nets will do next with Kyrie Irving's bad contract situation. Kevin Durant seems trapped in Brooklyn for the foreseeable future. Next, former Celtic Antoine Walker joins The Herd to discuss Boston's suffocating defense of the Brooklyn Nets, Phoenix's battle with New Orleans and Denver-Golden State. Finally, Colin lays out several comparisons for emerging NBA stars Ja Morant of the Memphis Grizzlies and Anthony Edwards of the Minnesota Timberwolves.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
